channel.title: Karat Sidhu
channel.description: I am Karat (Karatatiwant Singh) Sidhu. I work in the field of multi-omics, specifically, metabolomics and proteomics. My primary research involves the development of workflows for analysis and quantification of sophisticated biological samples for metabolomic and proteomic analysis, including the use of stable isotopes for development and analysis of such assays. Over the last 7 years I have been working a wide range of mass spec equipment including the high resolution Q-ToFs as well as triple quadrupoles, coupled with various liquid chromatography setups such as micro- and nano- LCs.

item.title: VSCode vs RStudio — Worth the Switch?

item.description: Does Microsoft’s flagship code editor hold up against the old favorite?
